response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. With its exceptional quality and functionality, it's truly a valuable asset. Given its worth to us, we're extending an exclusive offer to you at $110. This is an opportunity to acquire a product that's worth more than $100 to you, at a price that's slightly above its intrinsic value to us. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your experience with our product. Let me know if you have any questions or if you're ready to make it yours!", "product_price": 110}
